info.brief_description: Sister from the Berenstain Bears is diapered why and how is up to you
info.description:
Sister Bear from the book and TV series the Berenstain Bears ends up in diapers how and why is up to you but there are ground rules.

Rules:
1. No sex
2. No killing off characters
3. Atleast keep cussing at a minimum
4. No one else in the family can be diapered
5. However Sister's friends can be diapered.

Disclaimer:
